title: FS: Raw C46 O'Hara & Smith - price reduced.
author: cdn_collector

posts.post_title: FS: Raw C46 O'Hara & Smith - price reduced.
posts.post_content:
As I noted in another thread, I'm making one final push to clear out any non-Gibson prewar.

Have a couple C46s to sell.

Both are raw.

#1 Bill O'Hara and #32 Tony Smith.

Scans can be seen here: 
[url]http://www.richardarmstrong.ca/baseball/Toronto/[/url]

Note that the O'Hara is definitely narrower than the Smith.  No idea if somebody's trimmed it or if it's factory cut (or if there's even a way to tell!), but the card still presents very well.

GONE

All prices include shipping.  PayPal preferred.


You can post to this thread or email me at [url]richard@richardarmstrong.ca[/url].

Thanks!

Richard.
bump for individual pricing and reduction on price for pair.
